duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive software testing strategies for front-end and back-end applications using industry-standard tools.
Lead a team of testing specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set testing goals.
Analyze testing trends, defects, and system performance to identify improvement opportunities and refine testing strategies.
Manage cloud AWS services and developer tools for testing and deployment purposes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or 3 years of experience in Information Technology
